thread.title: Winshuttle for Salesforce® to be Demoed at SAP TechEd
thread.title_full: Winshuttle for Salesforce® to be Demoed at SAP TechEd

author: Kara Tiernan
title: Winshuttle for Salesforce® to be Demoed at SAP TechEd
text:
Winshuttle is pleased to announce it will be demoing Winshuttle for Salesforce at the SAP TechEd conference October 19-23rd in Las Vegas. This platform add-on for Winshuttle Studio does not require any changes to the Salesforce environment, and enables users to easily integrate Microsoft Excel with Salesforce to extract and upload data. Today’s cloud-based systems like Salesforce need to receive accurate and timely information from a number of sources, and Winshuttle for Salesforce allows users to build consistently reliable integration scenarios, without requiring technical skills or programming. Leveraging the power of the Winshuttle platform for Excel with Salesforce in the cloud, users can have fully functioning data management scripts operational in minutes, instead of the days or weeks needed for custom development.
“Winshuttle for Salesforce makes it surprisingly easy for non-technical users to create integration scenarios like Account, Contact, Case, Event and Lead, freeing up valuable Salesforce administrator time for more important system management activities,” said Clinton Jones, Winshuttle's Director of Solution Management for Finance. “This product is also useful for general data hygiene activities, as part of master data management and daily operations.”
Winshuttle for Salesforce is now available to the general public, and can be found on Salesforce AppExchange. Stop by the Winshuttle booth #173 at SAP TechEd to view a live demo.
About Winshuttle
Winshuttle software empowers customers to get control of their SAP ERP data through the use of lean applications that streamline data collection, data validation and data movement. Building upon customers’ existing investments, Winshuttle’s unique lean solutions delegate ownership and maintenance of data back to the business, increasing IT bandwidth and maximizing the velocity of SAP ERP data management and process automation.
Learn more about Winshuttle’s Lean Data Management platform by visiting http://www.winshuttle.com/lean-data-management/
